instructions.instruction: You are a public health officer tasked with implementing a new vaccination campaign in a city with diverse communities and local organizations. Develop an action plan to ensure high participation across all demographics.

As a product manager at a tech company launching a new app feature, you notice previous launches have led to unexpected customer support issues. Create a rollout strategy to minimize negative user experiences.

You are a lead researcher preparing a grant proposal to investigate a rare disease. Multiple departments, such as epidemiology, genetics, and clinical trials, have expressed interest in the project. Draft your proposal and outline your research methodology.

Serving as an event coordinator for a university’s multicultural festival, you must organize an opening ceremony that highlights the cultures of various campus organizations. Design a program for the ceremony.

You are a policy analyst tasked with recommending a new city ordinance on sustainable transportation. Several neighborhood associations and business groups have provided feedback on past proposals. Prepare your policy recommendation and rationale.

As a school principal, you are introducing a new digital learning platform. Teachers, parents, and IT staff have previously raised concerns about technology transitions. Prepare an implementation plan for the new platform.

You are a medical resident managing a patient with complex symptoms involving multiple organ systems. There are specialists in cardiology, neurology, and endocrinology available at your hospital. Formulate a care plan for the patient.

You are a software developer assigned to optimize the performance of a legacy system. The system is heavily used by various departments for different purposes, and documentation is outdated. Detail your approach to the optimization project.
As a museum curator, you have been asked to design an exhibit on local history, with contributions from historians, artists, and community elders available. Create your plan for curating the exhibit.
You are an HR manager revising your company’s employee wellness program. Previous initiatives received mixed feedback from staff across departments. Develop your revised wellness program proposal.

As a marketing specialist launching a new brand campaign for a product used by several customer segments, you have access to data from sales, design, and customer service teams. Outline your campaign strategy.

You are an urban planner tasked with redesigning a city park located near schools, residences, and local businesses. Multiple community groups have previously suggested features for the space. Create a design proposal for the park.

As a graduate teaching assistant for a large introductory course, students have varying academic backgrounds and some struggle with the material. Develop a plan to improve student engagement and learning outcomes.

You are an operations manager at a manufacturing facility where recent safety incidents have occurred on different shifts. Safety officers, line workers, and maintenance staff have submitted separate reports. Propose measures to improve safety.

As a grant writer at a nonprofit, you are preparing an application for funding a new community outreach program. The finance, outreach, and program evaluation teams have preliminary data relevant to the proposal. Draft your application.

You are a customer experience manager for an airline, tasked with reducing complaints about boarding procedures. Staff from gate operations, customer service, and logistics have shared informal feedback. Design an improvement plan.

As a high school science teacher, you are introducing a new lab activity that integrates chemistry and biology concepts. The school lab technician and other science teachers are available during planning. Develop your lesson plan.

You are an IT support lead for a hospital, asked to streamline the onboarding process for new staff who report difficulties with different software platforms. Trainers, department heads, and user manuals are available resources. Outline your proposed solution.

You are a logistics coordinator for a disaster relief organization preparing for hurricane season. Local government, first responders, and community volunteers have provided insights from previous emergencies. Create your preparedness plan.

As the coordinator for a regional science fair, you are responsible for designing the judging criteria and process. Judges from academia, industry, and local schools participate in the fair. Develop your criteria and judging protocol.

You are a library director implementing a new digital catalog system. Patrons, librarians, and IT staff have experienced challenges during past technology upgrades. Design your implementation process.

As a financial analyst, you are preparing the next quarter’s budget projection for your company. Various department heads have proposed new projects with differing priorities. Present your budget proposal.

You are a human resources business partner at a growing startup developing a flexible work policy. Feedback has been collected from employees, team leads, and executives in the past. Draft your recommended policy.
You are a school counselor developing a program to address bullying. Students, teachers, and parents have raised concerns about school climate. Prepare your program outline.

You are a clinical psychologist designing a support group for patients with chronic illness. Nursing staff, social workers, and patients’ families have expressed interest in participating in some way. Outline your plan for the support group.
